title: SkiFree
alt: And from that day on, I wore this little 'F' key pendant everywhere I went.
transcript:
[A screenshot of SkiFree, with the abominable snowman running towards the player.][Megan is sitting at her computer with her hands on the keyboard and thinking to herself:]
Megan (thought bubble): I've always thought of the SkiFree monster as a metaphor for the inevitability of death.[Cueball comes up behind her in a frameless panel.]
Cueball: SkiFree, huh? You know, you can press "F" to go faster than the monster and escape.[The screenshot again. The player is zooming away from the monster.][Megan sits at her computer in silence, with her hands now down to to her side.]
